data.text: @totalBPM Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Patrick. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@sofrxnts Hi pia! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@exolodi Hi @exolodi! To manage your booking and pay for the travel tax, please refer to our website via this link: https://t.co/k9grG8YJsw. Thank you

@pinzpar021 Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Erl. For further assistance, send an email thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.

@NoiNoi9987 Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Noi Noi. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

data.text: @heartsnrs Hi Heartsnrs. We will be glad to look into your concern. To further assist you and the security of your personal information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wmmkV, and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Thanks!

@chimmy7bangtan Hi chim ⁷. Foods that are not allowed for check-in is accepted for hand carry as long as it won't exceed with the size. Note also that you can bring a maximum of two (2) pieces only and with total combined weight of seven (7)kg or less. Learn more here https://t.co/rfiF2XsjFi.
@joncorazon Hi joncha. As per checking, you sent an email 38minutes ago. I'll let your case handler know that you reached out so that we can send you an update. Please expect an email from us soon.

@joncorazon Hi joncha. It reflects here that you sent an email just today, 38 minutes ago. I'll let your case handler know that you reached out so that we can send you an update. Please expect an email from us soon.

@18Alexderlord Hi Alexa. If you are having a hard time to connect with our live chat agent, you may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XT0nnK and we will respond to you through the email you provided.

urls.title: Cebu Pacific - CEB Super Pass
urls.description: We heard you, everyJuan! The CEB Super Pass is back, until October 13, 2022 only! Buy as many one-way vouchers as you can and fly to any Philippines destination, anytime! Terms and conditions apply. We've reached the maximum number of passes sold. This was a great run! Super thank you! CEB Super Pass selling period has ended. Check out our Seat Sale page for more offers! Redeem your voucher and book a flight to any Philippine destination! Redemption Period: October 10, 2022 to November 23, 2023 Travel

data.text: @koloRED_03 Hi Isay! You may visit https://t.co/C67eV6f1rH to be taken to the webpage directly. Then Click on the ‘Redeem CEB Super Pass’ Tab and enter the booking reference provided during purchase and the surname of any passenger in the booking reference.

data.text: @OT_NPI Hi Bakudan. Should there be any balance on the day of flight, guests will have to pay for the remaining balance in the airport, within the allowed cut-off time before flight departure. Otherwise, they will be denied check-in and boarding to the flight.
@kthscnry Further, the Passenger can only be accepted to the preferred or changed flight itinerary after payment of the applicable fees and penalties, which fees and penalties are non-refundable.
@kthscnry Hi ♡! For voluntary rebooking or changes in the itinerary and when the booking details have been changed, the Passenger can no longer revert to the original itinerary.

data.text: @BonjourLePlouc Hi Dee. Flights on which you may use your CEB Super Pass is subject to availability during redemption. You may check for the actual availability at flight search and choose from the flights listed  in https://t.co/C67eV6etC9 .

@claudiopoy Regret if you feel that way. Rest assured that we continue to listen and improve our services so we can deliver the best experience for everyJuan.

domain.name: TV Shows

entity.name: Game of Thrones
entity.description: George R.R. Martin's best-selling book series `A Song of Ice and Fire' is brought to the screen as HBO sinks its considerable storytelling teeth into the medieval fantasy epic. It's the depiction of two powerful families - kings and queens, knights and renegades, liars and honest men - playing a deadly game for control of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, and to sit atop the Iron Throne. Martin is credited as a co-executive producer and one of the writers for the series, which was filmed in Northern Ireland and Malta.

data.text: @kimchizeus Hi 𝘋𝘢𝘳🍡! Vape/E-cigarettes are permitted for hand carry baggage. If with built in battery, please Turn it upside down and must be individually protected to prevent accidental activation. The vape juice should also not exceed 100ml per bottle. See you!

data.text: @_lightyear I'm sorry to hear this 우주인. Please do the following troubleshooting. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser if possible. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated.

@nikkinyxb Hi MrsB. Here's how: - Log in to your account at https://t.co/5TLfYWv7EF
- Search for specific flight under ‘My Bookings’ then click the ‘Manage’ button
- Choose ‘Change Flight’ to select new travel dates, then follow succeeding instructions to complete your rebooking
Stay safe.
